          <title>
            <string language="en">Radioactive wastes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Radioaktive Abfälle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Déchets radioactifs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desperdícios radioativos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Effluenti radioattivi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ραδιενεργά απόβλητα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Desechos radioactivos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows three cans used to hold radioactive wastes from nuclear power stations.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nuclear power stations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radioactive wastes</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt drei Dosen, die benutzt 
werden, um radioaktive Abfälle von Atomkraftwerk anzuhalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre trois bidons utilisés 
pour tenir les déchets radioactifs des centrales nucléaires.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra três latas usadas prender
desperdícios radioativos das estações de potência nuclear.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra tre latte utilizzate 
per tenere gli effluenti radioattivi dalle centrali nucleari.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση τρία δοχεία που χρησιμοποιούνται 
εμφανίζει για να κρατήσουν τα ραδιενεργά απόβλητα από τους 
σταθμούς πυρηνικής ενέργειας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra tres latas usadas para 
celebrar desechos radioactivos de centrales nucleares.</string>
          </description>
